title: Daniel R. T. Filho
text:
Senior Full-Stack Engineer,
Data Scientist and Machine Learning Enthusiast




Overview
I am a Full-Stack Developer with extensive experience in a variety of technologies. My ability to integrate Front-End and Back-End allows me to create comprehensive and efficient solutions. With a quick learning ability and flexibility in workflow, I adapt rapidly to new technologies and project demands, ensuring the delivery of high-quality products.



Experience

Argus Solutions
Full-time · 8 months
Piracicaba, São Paulo, Brazil · Hybrid

July 2024 - January 2025 · 7 months
